extension.name: Google Drive Embed Plugins
extension.author: Sören
extension.description:
Thanks for installing the Google Drive Embed Plugins Package!

You now have two new plugins: a Content and an Editor Button Plugin. Remember to publish both plugins so you can use them.

For the Editor Button Plugin you need to take additional Steps before it can help you insert the correct tags into your Content. You need to go to "Plugins" => "Button - Google Drive Embed" and read the description to start with the application registration.
